froggyg.name: Froggy G
froggyg.description: Can dash around the battlefield. Becomes a watery tornado to deal heavy close ranged damage

one.name: Splash dash
one.description: Dash through enemies, stunning and damaging them.

two.name: Tornado
two.description: Use a rapid spinning technique, damaging all nearby enemies.

attack.name: Bolt .45 fish-gun
attack.description: Bolt .45 fish-gun. Short-ranged but deadly.

jump.description: Frog jump. Hold the button to jump higher.

lonestar.name: Sheriff Lonestar
lonestar.description: Use holo bull to push enemies away and dynamite to deal heavy area damage.

one.name: Dynamite throw
one.description: Throw sticks of dynamite at enemies. Hold the button to throw further.

two.name: Summon hyper bull
two.description: Lonestar summons a holo-bull, to knock enemies out of the way.

attack.name: Blaster
attack.description: Shred enemies in a mid to long ranged hail of blaster fire.

jump.description: Multi-jump rocket boots. Press the button in mid-air to jump again!

leon.name: Leon Chameleon
leon.description: Melee assassin that can go invisible. Uses his tongue to pull enemies towards him.

one.name: Cloaking skin
one.description: Become invisible to your foes, leaving a dummy to confuse them.

two.name: Tongue snatch
two.description: Tongue-grab your enemies and pull them towards you.

attack.name: Slash
attack.description: Leon slices his enemies with his razor-sharp lightsword.

jump.description: High reptile jump. Press the button to jump.

scoop.name: Scoop
scoop.description: Heals himself and snares groups of enemies with a long ranged hammer.

one.name: Binding of justice
one.description: Wrap yourself in healing bindings healing yourself and damaging nearby enemies.

two.name: Frozen hammer
two.description: Throw out a hammer of ice that snares multiple enemies. The longer it flies, the more damage it deals and the longer the snare lasts.

attack.name: Sword Strike
attack.description: Scoop alternates between a slash and a sweeping cleave attack that heals you.

jump.description: Being a gelatinous being helps in performing high wobbling jumps.

gnaw.name: Gnaw
gnaw.description: Applies poison through biting and spitting at enemies. Creates Weedling mini turrets.

one.name: Acid spit
one.description: Spit out a sticky spray of acid goo that damages enemies over time. Spit will also fertilize and heal weedlings.

two.name: Grow weedling
two.description: Bite enemies to gather Growth parts, then use those to grow a weedling.

attack.name: Bite
attack.description: Gnaw bites his enemies with his filthy maw.

jump.description: Skroggle jump. Press the button to jump.

raelynn.name: Raelynn
raelynn.description: Uses a laser snipe to deal heavy damage. Throws time rifts that slow enemies.

one.name: Snipe
one.description: Press the button to take aim, then Press the button to shoot, firing a powerful and long-range shot that pierces enemies. Shoot after the beep.

two.name: Timerift
two.description: Throw a deployable vertical rift that slows time. Hold the button to throw further.

attack.name: Protoblaster
attack.description: Raelynn fires her protoblaster 'Cuddles'.

jump.description: Six million Solar human jump.

ayla.name: Ayla
ayla.description: Melee character that can activte Rage to fly and deal area damage. Can shoot an Evil Eye that deal heavy single target damage.

one.name: Rage
one.description: Press the button to toggle rage mode on/off, making Ayla float and deal heavy area damage.

two.name: Evil eye
two.description: Unleash your third eye. The evil eye is more effective the less health you have.

attack.name: Chain whack
attack.description: Ayla swings the lock on her chain.

jump.description: Ayla is awesome at skipping rope!

clunk.name: Clunk
clunk.description: Shoots rockets. Explodes for massive area damage to enemies and himself. Bites enemies to regain health.

one.name: Vacuum bite
one.description: Clunk bites nearby enemies, replenishing his own health.

two.name: Explode
two.description: Self-destruct, dealing damage to yourself and nearby enemies.

attack.name: Missiles
attack.description: Shoot volleys of missiles at your opponents.

jump.description: Clunk has a temporary jet boost. Hold the button to ascend.

voltar.name: Voltar
voltar.description: Shoots orbs that heal allied Awesomenauts and damage enemies. Summons a healbot that delivers a healing burst. Summons drons that shoot at nearby enemies, which can also be fired one by one.

one.name: Suicide drones
one.description: Voltar automatically generates robodrones that deal damage to nearby enemies. Press the button to shoot one robodrone, dealing ranged area damage.

two.name: Healbot
two.description: Summon a nanotech robodoctor that will heal you and your allies.

attack.name: Techno synaptic wave
attack.description: Voltar can shoot healing blasts at allies. The longer the distance, the more the blast heals. Additionally, these blasts deal damage to enemies.

jump.description: Voltar can hover through the air. Hold the button while in mid-air to float.

coco.name: Coco Nebulon
coco.description: Shoots a long range detonatable ball lightning and can escape using a blazing lighning trail.

one.name: Blaze
one.description: Temporarily, Coco's hoverboard leaves a trail of electricity that slows and damages enemies.

two.name: Ball lightning
two.description: Shoot a ball lightning. Detonate it at any time with a second the button press.

attack.name: Shock attack
attack.description: Channel Coco's psycho-electric powers through her unfortunate enemies.

jump.description: Hoverboard jump, with a chance to do a front-flip. Tubular!

skolldir.name: Skølldir
skolldir.description: Throws enemies behind him and deals heavy damage every third hit. Creates earthquakes that deal area damage over time.

one.name: Earthquake
one.description: Buttstomp the ground to start an earthquake which damages enemies in front of you in a line.

two.name: Mighty throw
two.description: Hurl your enemies backwards with this mighty throw.

attack.name: Bash
attack.description: Skølldir bashes his enemies to bits with a devastating 3 hit combo.

jump.description: Explosive fart! Press the button in mid-air to receive an extra boost!

yuri.name: Yuri
yuri.description: Flyer that pelts area with damaging mines. Can reate a timebubble that slows enemies and speeds up allies.

one.name: Mine deploying
one.description: Pelt your enemies with mines that detonate upon contact.

two.name: Time warp
two.description: Generate a time-warping field, slowing enemies around him.

attack.name: Lazer
attack.description: Yuri fries his enemies with a concentrated beam of pure energy.

jump.description: Fly freely with Yuri's jetpack. Press the button to activate or deactivate.

derpl.name: Derpl Zork
derpl.description: Transforms into a heavily armed static siege mode. Lays snaring traps while mobile.

one.name: Grid trap / Nuke
one.description: Deploy traps that will ensnare enemies, locking them in place. Nuke in siege mode. Detonate it at any time with a second the button press.

two.name: Siege mode
two.description: Transform into a static siege mode, enabling deadly weaponry. Siege mode also provides debuff immunity. Press the button to toggle siege mode on/off.

attack.name: Cat shot
attack.description: Mew enemies into oblivion by shooting explosive holocats. Gatling fire in siege mode.

jump.description: Derpl's walking desk has a temporary jet boost. Hold the button to ascend!

vinnie.name: Vinnie & Spike
vinnie.description: Flyer that can dive into enemies for heavy burst damage. Creates a smoke cloud to blind enemies.

one.name: Spike Dive
one.description: Dive through enemies and shoot spikes in a circle at the end.

two.name: Smoke screen
two.description: Leave a cloud of smoke behind to blind your enemies and protect your allies, while you escape.

attack.name: Bubble gun
attack.description: Shoot a burst of rapid piercing bubbles.

jump.description: Spike gasps for air and floats upwards.

genji.name: Genji
genji.description: Shields allied Awesomenauts. Cocoons enemies, taking them out of the fight for a while.

one.name: Monarch Blessing
one.description: Unleash a prayer to the space butterfly and receive a blessing for you and your nearby allies.

two.name: Cocoon
two.description: Gurgle and spit out a ball of silk web that cocoons enemies and removes them from combat.

attack.name: Butterfly shot
attack.description: Shoot out an electric butterfly that returns to your wand.

jump.description: Genji flings himself up and can hover with help of the butterfly spirit.

swiggins.name: Admiral Swiggins
swiggins.description: Pulls himself towards enemies and can chain enemies to the ground with his anchor. Trades his melee attack for ranged ink shot whiles his anchor is out.

one.name: Anchor hook
one.description: Swiggins hurls Homboldt forward. If it hits an enemy Awesomenaut or a wall he will fly to the target.

two.name: Drop Anchor
two.description: Swiggins throws Homboldt out. If it hits an enemy Awesomenaut they will be chained to Homboldt.

attack.name: Anchor swing / Ink spray
attack.description: Admiral Swiggins swings his trustworthy Homboldt or sprays corrosive ink.

jump.description: Flinging himself upwards, Admiral Swiggins can perform thrusts in the air by pressing the button.

rocco.name: Rocco
rocco.description: Shoots an arrow that can travel the entire battlefield. Uses Vengeance to enhance his arrows with slowing power.

one.name: Vengeance
one.description: Run at normal speed while shooting and add a slow effect to rapid arrows for a set amount of time. Hitting enemies with your rapid arrows increases the duration of vengeance.

two.name: Precision shot
two.description: Fire an arrow that flies through terrain and deals damage to enemy Awesomenauts. Hold the button to straighten the shot and increase range.

attack.name: Rapid arrows
attack.description: Fire rapid arrows that will change into slowing arrows while vengeance is active.

jump.description: Bird hop. Hold the button to jump higher.

ksenia.name: ksenia
ksenia.description: Throws knives and uses a 3-hit combo attac for quick damage and uses Vanish to quickly displace herself and disappear.

one.name: Scissors throw
one.description: Throw a fast flying scissor that deals bonus damage to enemy Awesomenauts. Ksenia can carry up to 4 scissors. Scissors can be picked up if they hit terrain.

two.name: Vanish
two.description: Roll into stealth for a short time and silence your opponents when you break stealth with an attack.

attack.name: Cut and trim
attack.description: Give your opponents a haircut with a combo of 3 cuts that increase in damage with every hit.

jump.description: Acrobatic double jump. Press the button to jump again.

ix.name: IX the Interloper
ix.description: Can link up with allies or enemies and switch places with them. Can become impervious to damage for a short while.

one.name: Psionic Bond/Displace
one.description: Create a temporary bond between the Ix and an Awesomenaut that heals friendly targets and damages enemy targets. Swap places with the bonded Awesomenaut with a second the button press!

two.name: Refract
two.description: Disperse into energized crystals to become impervious to any damage for a short period of time. You can fly while refracted.

attack.name: Radiate
attack.description: Ix throws a sharp, long-ranged crystal with some shotgun-like crystals for extra damage close range.

jump.description: Ascend into the air and stay afloat by using the crystal's powers. Hold the button to ascend.

ted.name: Ted Mcpain
ted.description: Switches between a shotgun plus an attack enhancing stimpacks and a machine gun plus a targetable airstrike.

one.name: Airstrike
one.description: Call in an ion cannon airstrike for maximum damage. Only available while in machinegun mode.

two.name: Stimpack
two.description: Stimpacks make Ted go berserk, enhancing his attack speed. Only available while in shotgun mode.

attack.name: Shotgun and machine gun
attack.description: Ted can alternate between a shotgun, that holds 5 bullets, and a machinegun. Swap with the button, Shoot with the button.

jump.description: This marine can handle any assault course with his jump-pack.

penny.name: Penny Fox
penny.description: Gain charges with her melee attack. Spends charges on her dashing Pounce or her damagin Energy Pulse

one.name: Pounce
one.description: Consume up to 4 charges to pounce forward, knocking back enemies you come in contact with. Each charge increases range and damage.

two.name: Energy pulse
two.description: Consume up to 4 charges to shoot a piercing energy pulse that amplifies damage. Each charge increases the damage.

attack.name: Claw
attack.description: Penny strikes with her claw, awarding a charge when hitting an enemy. Max 4 charges.

jump.description: Being super agile, Penny can leap up and perform a triple jump.

sentry.name: Sentry X-58
sentry.description: Can teleport across the map. Shields damage and returns it in the form of a damagin black hole.

one.name: Teleport beacon
one.description: Sentry deploys a beacon to which he can teleport with a second the button press at any time. Sentry deals a damage dealing pulse at arrival.

two.name: Black hole sun
two.description: Activate a damage collecting black hole that can be shot with a second the button press and placed with a third the button press, pulling enemies towards it and dealing the collected damage.

attack.name: Photon mine launcher
attack.description: Warbots from the X-58 line come with a high powered photon mine launcher.

jump.description: Standard warbot energy thruster, for short leaps in combat. Hold the button to ascend.

skree.name: Skree
skree.description: Shoots lightning and can summon a movement blocking totem. Shoots a sawblade that deals damage.

one.name: Totem of power
one.description: Summon a robotic wall that blocks enemy movement. Your team can stand on the wall. Hold the button to throw further.

two.name: Saw blade
two.description: Shoot a spinning blade that stays in one position for a limited time. You can place it with a second the button press and pull it towards you with a third the button press.

attack.name: Lightning rod
attack.description: Shoot lightning from your mechanical rod. Deals half damage to secondary targets.

jump.description: Skree floats on a swirling set of blades. By holding the button he can stay at the same altitude in air.

nibbs.name: Nibbs
nibbs.description: Shoots an orb to which she can teleport and can breathe flames for heavy burst damage.

one.name: Orb of Omicron
one.description: Send out an orb to which you can teleport with a second the button press.

two.name: Fire breath
two.description: Hold your position and unleash your fiery breath on your foes.

attack.name: Dragon frenzy
attack.description: Strike with your claws. Each hit will give a stack of frenzy, increasing your attack speed.

jump.description: Nibbs can double jump. Press the button in mid-air to jump again.

yoolip.name: Professor Yoolip
yoolip.description: Summs robotic dinosaurs and uses Griping Gaze to hold enemies in place. His wrench can be used to heal allied droids and summons.

one.name: Summon robo dinos
one.description: Create 3 robo dinos that will walk forward and attack enemies.

two.name: Gripping gaze
two.description: Throw out a third eye gaze that will stun you and the targeted enemy Awesomenaut for a while. The stun also breaks if the enemy gets out of range.

attack.name: Wrench smack
attack.description: Smack your enemies with a huge wrench. Hitting friendly droids will heal them.

jump.description: Sadak high jump.

chucho.name: Chucho Krokk
chucho.description: Very mobile on his bike. Can step off, leaving his bike as a static turret. Can throw bombs that stick to enemies and deal area damage after a delay.

one.name: Hyper bike/turret
one.description: Summon a fast bike with a railgun to drive into combat. Dismount with a second the button press and deploy your bike as a turret. When you are too far away you can detonate the bike by holding the button to allow it to be resummoned.

two.name: Sticky bomb/Nitro Boost
two.description: Throw a sticky bomb to stick onto anything. Explodes in an area after being stuck for some time. Hold the button to throw further. This skill changes into a Nitro Boost when on your bike.

attack.name: Double pistol/bike blaster
attack.description: Shoot two successive shots each time. Changes into a forward rapid shot when on your bike.

jump.description: Dramatic-entrance high jump when on foot. Hovers around when on his bike.

jimmy.name: Jimmy and the Luxe5000
jimmy.description: Uses a 3-hit combo melee attack that can charge forward, knocking enemies away. Can unleash a rocket barrage.

one.name: LUX Charge
one.description: Hold the button to charge forward and knock enemies back while dealing damage.

two.name: Missle Barrage
two.description: Enter a missile barrage mode and unleash long-ranged missiles onto your enemies.

attack.name: Rattle Smash
attack.description: The LUX5000 smashes its rattle arms to the ground. Each third smash unleashes a rattle area effect that damages enemies in an area around you.

jump.description: Stroller-jet boost jump. Hold the button to ascend.

max.name: Max Focus
max.description: Flyer that can shoot out horizontal bullets. Can also fire a time slowing orb.

one.name: Scene Illumination
one.description: Light up the scene with a steady stream of lights that deal damage.

two.name: Slow-mo Shot
two.description: Launch an area that slowly flies forward and slows time.

attack.name: Flood light
attack.description: Short ranged area attack. Briefly overexpose your scene with a nuclear powered floodlight!

jump.description: Fly everywhere to catch the perfect angles.

deadlift.name: Samuel "Deadlift" Gaines
deadlift.description: Can lunge into battle to deal damage and shield his allies from incoming enemy attacks using his protective shield.

one.name: Power Lunge
one.description: In true Bovinian fashion, lunge into enemies and cause an explosive burst of energy.

two.name: Protective Pose
two.description: Strike a pose to summon holo-tech's newest protective shield and soak up incoming damage for you and your allies.

attack.name: Iron Slam
attack.description: Swing Deadlift's muscular cyborg arms to slam your enemies.

jump.description: Deadlift uses his powerful legs, trained extensively on the legpress, to launch himself into the air.

dizzy.name: Dizzy
dizzy.description: Dashes around quickly by using multiple stackable dashes. Can leave and explosive clone which explodes in an area.

one.name: Multi Dash
one.description: Save up to 3 dashes to unleash unto your enemies.

two.name: Explosive Clone
two.description: Leave a water clone at your location that explodes and deals damage in an area.

attack.name: Bubble Shot
attack.description: Fire a fast-moving bubble that deals damage.

jump.description: Hop around with a sassy look.

smiles.name: Smiles
smiles.description: Hooks enemy players and can drag them for a short distance. Deals heavy damage with his flamethrower and tailwhip.

one.name: Tail whip
one.description: Smack your foes with your reinforced tail, knocking them back.

two.name: Trapper's hook
two.description: Throw out a hook that will connect with enemy Awesomenauts and lets you drag them around the map for a short duration.

attack.name: Bush fire
attack.description: Fire your flamethrower and set everything ablaze, dealing bonus damage to enemy Awesomenauts.

jump.description: High reptilian jump. Hold the button longer to jump higher!

rocket.name: Commander Rocket
rocket.description: Fires a huge long ranged rocket and can place a laser trap to deal damage in an area.

one.name: Rocket Launch
one.description: Fire a huge rocket that deals damage and knocks enemies back.

two.name: Laser Trap
two.description: Place a rotating laser trap that deals damage to enemies in its path.

attack.name: Charged Salvo
attack.description: Load up to 3 missiles in your rocket launcher and fire them in a single bunch.

jump.description: No-one knows how he even jumps with his launcher. He must have some secret technique.

qi-tara.name: Qi'Tara
qi-tara.description: Can teleport to a marked target and deal heavy damage around her.

one.name: Chakram shift
one.description: Throw out a chakram that can stick unto enemies and shift to it on second press. This leaves another chakram that can be shifted back to.

two.name: Seven star strike
two.description: Temporarily gain the ability to slash rapidly around you.

attack.name: Poisonous Blade
attack.description: Slash and inflict a stacking poison onto your enemies.

jump.description: Chilasi robe-powered double Jump.

snork.name: Snork Gunk
snork.description: Can float short durations and pull himself quickly around the map. Summons explosive shells that rotate around him.

one.name: Sticky snail
one.description: Summon a holographic super snail to quickly pull yourself through the map and towards enemy Awesomenauts.

two.name: Shell bombs
two.description: Summon rotating shells around you that explode on contact.

attack.name: Conch dunk
attack.description: Summon shells and knock down your enemies.

jump.description: Float above the ground with this belt and Hold the button to ascend.
